All my HD releases have a 5.1 track but it is not the default track.  If you have an Apple TV enable Dolby Digital in the settings and the 5.1 track will play by default however.  On a PS3 you will have to select the 2nd track.  If you use VLC you will have to select the 2nd track.

the default track is a dolby pro logic II track.

I really appreciate it and I hope you know how many people look forward to your next project.  I myself can say that all of the video content on my iphone and ipad is because of you.  All hail to the Queen!

Hey HR, I'm suddenly having problems playing 5.1 on your movies via ATV2. No audio at all for this upload, but older ones work fine.  If I turn off Dolby Digital, the 2ch stereo plays fine.  Do you think this is related to the recent ATV firmware upgrade?  Other movies in 5.1 play fine so I'm confused.

try firmware 4.4.2.

http://support.apple.com/kb/HT5021

There were bugs with 4.4 and 4.4.1.
